name: Super Turbo Sudoku
description: Welcome to "Super Turbo Sudoku", a game not about love, trust, hope or bravery, but about solving Sudokus. No matter if you prefer to just relax solving easy riddles or if you want to prove yourself with insane challenges, this game has it all!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 320 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 400 MB available space
